addon.name: AutoSEO
addon.description: Handles in a smart way the SEO aspect of your actions (ie. creates redirects automatically)

queries.item: CREATE TABLE ?:autoseo_entries ( `entry_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `object_id` mediumint(8) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `object_type` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `parent_object_id` mediumint(8) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `parent_object_type` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `value` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `status` char(1) DEFAULT NULL, `lang_code` varchar(2) DEFAULT NULL, `company_id` mediumint(8) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`entry_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE ?:autoseo_links ( `link_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `entry_id` mediumint(8) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `parent_id` mediumint(8) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `value` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `parent` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `lang_code` varchar(2) DEFAULT NULL, `company_id` mediumint(8) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`link_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
